name: Paradox Coffee
description:
"Paradox Coffee" V1.0.0 
A game for coffee lovers
Made in a week for Clicker Jam 2023

A brief game and with super-simple controls. Just read what this  caffeinomaniac guy has to tell you. To play you just have to... uh... well, click. And also click faster!

Story:
A coffee addict man living in a distant galaxy is very troubled every time he runs out of coffee. There is no supply of coffee in far space. But he has built an interdimensional spaceship where he can reach the speed of light to travel back in time and refill his cup over and over again.

Program, design and sound by LDPFDEV
